goal.ch: 建立培養製造工程實習 Ｉ專業知識
goal.en: Establish and cultivate professional knowledge of manufacturing engineering experiments.

outline.ch: 製造工程實習是熟悉機械工作法的基礎課程。主要目的在使機械系學生利用各種工具機進行不同形狀的零組件加工時所產生的現象有初步的認識，進而從實習中理解工作原理和培養正確操作技能。本課程內容包括鉗工、車床、銑床、鑽床、磨床、鋸床、焊接及放電加工機等設備的操作及單項專業技術的學習等。
outline.en: Manufacturing engineering experiments is a basic course to be familiar with mechanical working methods. The main purpose is to enable students in the Department of Mechanical Engineering to have a preliminary understanding of the phenomena that occur when processing parts of different shapes with various machine tools, and then to understand the working principle and cultivate correct operation skills from the practice. The content of this course includes the operation of fitters, lathes, milling machines, drilling machines, grinders, sawing machines, welding, electrical discharge machines and other equipment, as well as the learning of individual professional technologies.

textbook.ch:
"1.本課程自編課綱，並依課綱講授
2.機械製造之必修課程用書皆可作為本課程之參考書"
textbook.en:
"1. This course is self-editing and teaching.
2. The required course books of mechanical manufacturing can be used as reference books for this course."

gradMethod.ch:
"本課程重視實習與安全問題，與其他課程評分方法不同，主要依據：
1. 實習成果60%
2. 筆試15%
3. 出席狀況25%"
gradMethod.en:
"This course focuses on internship and safety issues, and is different from other courses in the grading method. The main basis is:
1. Internship results 60%
2. Examination 15%
3. Attendance 25%"

officeHour.ch: 課程前一小時 或 另約時間
officeHour.en: One hour before the course or another appointment.

flexDiscription.ch: 因應同學實作狀況調整補作周次。
flexDiscription.en: Adjust the weekly frequency of supplementary work according to the actual situation of students.

en.competencies: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation

ch: 系所:限機械工程學系。年級:限一年級。班別:限C。
系所:限機械工程學系。年級:限二年級、三年級、四年級。
en: Department:Department of Mechanical Engineering only.Year:First Year only.Class:C only.
Department:Department of Mechanical Engineering only.Year:Second Year、Third Year、Fourth Year only.
